snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include how an examination of how an arguably great product like Everpix can hit the funding squeeze. Plus, with the demise of the online black market, Silk Road, the so-called dark Web dream, lives on.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include how an examination of how an arguably great product like Everpix can hit the funding squeeze. Plus, with the demise of the online black market, Silk Road, the so-called dark Web dream, lives on.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: On Everpix, and 'Silk Road 2.0' Launches
